          	def create
        
      6.

          8

          1

    18. 
          1

          	end

          5
          
          					if row_count != 0

          		def file_properly_formatted?(parsed_file)
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
          			file_header = parsed_file[0]
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          			if file_header[0] =~ /question/i &&
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
          				file_header[1] =~ /correct answer/i &&
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          				file_header[2] =~ /wrong answer/i &&
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          				file_header[3] =~ /wrong answer/i &&
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          				file_header[4] =~ /wrong answer/i &&
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          				file_header[5] =~ /points/i
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
          				return true
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
          			else
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          				return false
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          			end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          		end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          		
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
          		def create_task(row)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          4
          
          			t = Task.new
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          4
          
          			t.question = row[0]
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          4
          
          			t.answer1 = row[1]
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          4
          
          			t.answer2 = row[2]
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          4
          
          			t.answer3 = row[3]
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          4
          
          			t.answer4 = row[4]
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          4
          
          			t.correct_answer = 1
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          4
          
          			t.points = row[5]
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          4
          
          			return t.save
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          		end
        
      159.

          end

          	# Disable request forgery protection in test environment
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
          	config.action_controller.allow_forgery_protection    = false
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          	# Tell Action Mailer not to deliver emails to the real world.
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          	# The :test delivery method accumulates sent emails in the
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          	# ActionMailer::Base.deliveries array.
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
          	config.action_mailer.delivery_method = :test
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          	
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
          	ActionMailer::Base.delivery_method = :test
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          	# Use SQL instead of Active Record's schema dumper when creating the test database.
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          	# This is necessary if your schema can't be completely dumped by the schema dumper,
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          	# like if you have constraints or database-specific column types
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          	# config.active_record.schema_format = :sql

    34.

      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # Your secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          # If you change this key, all old signed cookies will become invalid!
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # Make sure the secret is at least 30 characters and all random,
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          # no regular words or you'll be exposed to dictionary attacks.
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
          SampleApp::Application.config.secret_token = '9b236bd0ecc0b59559dbd1c84d82c4b5c96546a9228e9d3fbeace2ff6fddd7ac3e21ef2008e7e4577ae2a410fc72fd50ad11c5480d72ff305c8653048f175bde'

          1
          
          			it "should have a flash error message" do

          1
          
          				put :update, :id => @path, :path => @attr

          			end

      253.

          1
          
          				it "should change a path" do
        
      254.

          1

          1

          1

      396.

      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          1
          
          		describe "users score on results screen" do
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          1
          
          			before(:each) do
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          4
          
          				@quiz_session = DateTime.now
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          
          
          			end
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
          		
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          1
          
          			it "should be 0/0 when all questions are skipped" do
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          1
          
          				@completed_task1 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task1, :user => @user, :quiz_session => @quiz_session, :status_id => 2)
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          1
          
          				@completed_task2 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task2, :user => @user, :quiz_session => @quiz_session, :status_id => 2)
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          1
          
          				get :continue, :id => @path, :count => 2, :max => 2
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          1
          
          				response.should have_selector("p", :content => "0/0")			
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          
          
          			end
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          
          
          		
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          1
          
          			it "should be 0/2 when all answers are incorrect" do
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          1
          
          				@completed_task1 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task1, :user => @user, :quiz_session => @quiz_session, :status_id => 0)
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          1
          
          				@completed_task2 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task2, :user => @user, :quiz_session => @quiz_session, :status_id => 0)
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          1
          
          				get :continue, :id => @path, :count => 2, :max => 2
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          1
          
          				response.should have_selector("p", :content => "0/2")
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          
          
          			end
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          
          
          			
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          1
          
          			it "should be 2/2 when all answers are correct" do
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          1
          
          				@completed_task1 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task1, :user => @user, :quiz_session => @quiz_session, :status_id => 1)
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          1
          
          				@completed_task2 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task2, :user => @user, :quiz_session => @quiz_session, :status_id => 1)
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          1
          
          				get :continue, :id => @path, :count => 2, :max => 2
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          1
          
          				response.should have_selector("p", :content => "2/2")
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          
          
          			end
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
          			
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          1
          
          			it "should be 1/2 when half answers are incorrect" do
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          1
          
          				@completed_task1 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task1, :user => @user, :quiz_session => @quiz_session, :status_id => 0)
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          1
          
          				@completed_task2 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task2, :user => @user, :quiz_session => @quiz_session, :status_id => 1)
        
      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          1
          
          				get :continue, :id => @path, :count => 2, :max => 2
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          1

      180.

          1
          
          			describe "incorrectly answered question table" do
        
      181. 
      
        
    181.

          			describe "Success" do

          1

      397.

          3
          
          					@attr = { :name => "Changed Test Name",

      441. 
      
        
    441. 
          1
          
          		describe "GET 'purchase'" do
        
      442. 
      
        
    442. 
          1
          
          			describe "when user has insufficient points" do
        
      443. 
      
        
    443. 
          1
          
          				before(:each) do
        
      444. 
      
        
    444. 
          3
          
          					@user.earned_points = 10
        
      445. 
      
        
    445. 
          3
          
          					@user.spent_points = 10
        
      446. 
      
        
    446. 
          3
          
          					@user.save!
        
      447. 
      
        
    447. 
          
          
          				end
        
      448. 
      
        
    448. 
          
          
          				
        
      449. 
      
        
    449. 
          1
          
          				it "should display error message" do
        
      450. 
      
        
    450. 
          1
          
          					get :purchase, :id => @reward
        
      451. 
      
        
    451. 
          1
          
          					flash[:info].should =~ /do not have enough points/i
        
      452.

          				it "should redirect to root path" do

          					get :show, :id => "abc"

          1
          
          			describe "when they exist" do
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
          				before(:each) do
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          3
          
          					@path1 = Factory(:path, :user => @other_user, :name => "Name1")
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          3
          
          					@path2 = Factory(:path, :user => @other_user, :name => "Name2")
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          					
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          3
          
          					@enrollment1 = Factory(:enrollment, :path => @path1, :user => @user)
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          3
          
          					@enrollment2 = Factory(:enrollment, :path => @path2, :user => @user)
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          					
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          3
          
          					@task1_path1 = Factory(:task, :path => @path1, :points => 2)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          3
          
          					@user.award_points(@task1_path1)
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          3
          
          					@task2_path1 = Factory(:task, :path => @path1, :points => 2)
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          3
          
          					@user.award_points(@task2_path1)
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          3
          
          					@task3_path1 = Factory(:task, :path => @path1, :points => 2)
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          3
          
          					@user.award_points(@task3_path1)
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          3
          
          					@path1_earned_points = 6
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          					
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          3
          
          					@task1_path2 = Factory(:task, :path => @path2, :points => 7)
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          3
          
          					@user.award_points(@task1_path2)
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          3
          
          					@task2_path2 = Factory(:task, :path => @path2, :points => 7)
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          3
          
          					@user.award_points(@task2_path2)
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          3
          
          					@task3_path2 = Factory(:task, :path => @path2, :points => 7)
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          3
          
          					@user.award_points(@task3_path2)
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          3
          
          					@path2_earned_points = 21
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
          					
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          3
          
          					@completed_task1_path1 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task1_path1, :user => @user)
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          3
          
          					@completed_task2_path1 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task2_path1, :user => @user)
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          3
          
          					@completed_task1_path2 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task1_path2, :user => @user)
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          3
          
          					@completed_task2_path2 = Factory(:completed_task, :task => @task2_path2, :user => @user)
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          					
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          3
          
          					@total_earned_points = @path1_earned_points + @path2_earned_points

    198. 
          
          
          				end

          1
          
          			before(:each) do
        
      341.

          5
          
          				@user = test_sign_in(Factory(:user))

          5
          
          				user1 = Factory(:user, :email => "indextest1@testing.com")
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          5
          
          				user2 = Factory(:user, :email => "indextest2@testing.com")
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          5
          
          				@users = [@user, user1, user2]
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
          				
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          5
          
          				30.times do
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          150
          
          					@users << Factory(:user, :email => Factory.next(:email))
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          
          
          				end
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          
          
          			end

          1
          
          				it "should have the right title" do

    spec/models/reward_spec.rb

          		it "should reject a duplicate email address" do

          1

          1

          1

          1
          
          	describe "password validations" do
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
          		it "should require a password and confirmation" do
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
          			pw = ""
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
          			pw_conf = ""
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
          			user = User.new(@attr.merge(:password => pw, :password_confirmation => pw_conf))
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
          			user.should_not be_valid
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          		end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          		
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
          		it "should require a matching password confirmation" do
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
          			pw_conf = "not foobar"
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
          			user = User.new(@attr.merge(:password_confirmation => pw_conf))
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
          			user.should_not be_valid
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          		end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          		
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
          		it "should reject short passwords" do
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
          			pw = "a" * 5
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
          			pw_conf = pw
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
          			user = User.new(@attr.merge(:password => pw, :password_confirmation => pw_conf))
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
          			user.should_not be_valid
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          		end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          		
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          1
          
          		it "should reject long passwords" do
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
          			pw = "a" * 41
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
          			pw_conf = pw
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
          			user = User.new(@attr.merge(:password => pw, :password_confirmation => pw_conf))

    85. 
          1
          
          			user.should_not be_valid
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          		end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          	end

      138.

          1
          
          		it "should not change the password when toggled" do
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
          			lambda do
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
          				@user.toggle!(:admin)
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
          				@user.reload

          			end.should_not change(@user, :encrypted_password)

          1

          	describe "points" do

      292.

          		describe "award_points" do

          1

          1

      297.

          			end
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
          				
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
          			it "should add task's points to the appropriate enrollment's total_points" do

          1
          
          				@user.award_points(@task)

          1
          
          				@user.enrollments.find_by_path_id(@path.id).total_points.should == @task.points
        
      302.

          			end
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
          		end		
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
          		
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
          		describe "debit_points" do
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          1
          
          			it "should add points to spent points" do
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
          				current_points = @user.spent_points
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          1
          
          				@user.debit_points(@reward.points)
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          1
          
          				@user.spent_points.should > current_points
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          1
          
          				@user.spent_points.should == current_points + @reward.points
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
          			end
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
          		end
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
          		
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
          		describe "available_points" do
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          1
          
          			it "should equal the earned points minus the spent points" do
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          1
          
          				@user.earned_points = 100
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          1
          
          				@user.spent_points = 25
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          1
          
          				@user.available_points.should == 75
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          			end
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
          		end
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
          	end
        
      322.

          end
